value.name: Case of San Antonio man who died under police custody gets new life
value.description: Blanca Aguirre holds up photographs of her late husband, Jesse Aguirre, during an event put on to honor the families of victims of police violence ... and Antronie Scott alongside their families ...

value.name: San Antonio police officer who shot unarmed man to be fired
value.description: Police spokeswoman Romana Lopez said in an ... the night of Feb. 4 by undercover officers to assist in arresting Antronie Scott on two warrants, one for being a felon in possession of a firearm ...

value.name: Legislators running out of time to pass bills curbing law enforcement agencies from hiring bad cops
value.description: With less than a week and a half left in the legislative session, bills to crack down on police officers with histories of misconduct have been caught in the crosshairs of inter-chamber tensions ...
